Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. I believe it could greatly benefit you in your personal or professional endeavors. Considering its outstanding features and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique value it brings to its users. I look forward to hearing your decision and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
